vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a monetary donation in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 from Fair Park First for the exploration of the history of the Hall of Negro Life through the Office of Arts and Culture; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 in the Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund; and (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 in the Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund - Not to exceed $7,500.00 - Financing: Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund; Revenue: Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund $7,500.00
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a monetary donation in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 from Fair Park First for the exploration of the history of the Hall of Negro Life through the Office of Arts and Culture; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 in the Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund; and (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $7,500.00 in the Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund - Not to exceed $7,500.00 - Financing: Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund; Revenue: Office of Cultural Affairs Gift and Donations Fund $7,500.00
